item.title: Filtering Duplicate Messages in Twitch Chat
item.description: I recently built this toy command line interface (CLI) app for fun. You can see a higher resolution video of it in action by clicking the image below. The video above is a snapshot of the CLI in action during the middle of a speed run of the Nintendo 64 game The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time, hosted on Twitch.tv. It shows the filtering in action, in the middle of a burst of the WutFace spam, which you can see in the lower left of the above video.
